Text:
Same for me. I've replayed these games loads of times. They still hold up, even after all these years. And of course there is some nostalgia as well : )

Hopefully this torrent will stay online forever. If it for some sad reason should die, check www.lbahq.com . These great packages come from there.
I love this game! I need this download! Thanks, LBAHQ! *--*
Remember that it is available with even more goodies at GOG.com! Support the developers (or whoever got the rights now. We need LBA3 to happen.
